summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1436, for the improvement of 36th Avenue, from East Cherry Street to East Spring Street; 37th Avenue, from East Cherry Street to East Marion Street; East Marion Street; and East Columbia Street, each from 35th Avenue to 37th Avenue, all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 15532 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
